name: KN-95 Face Mask
description: A KN95 mask is a type of respirator face mask designed to achieve a close facial fit and efficient filtration of airborne particles. It is similar in function to the N95 respirator mask widely used in healthcare settings. The KN in KN95 stands for Chinese standard, indicating that it meets the standards set by China's National Health Commission for filtering out at least 95% of airborne particles. KN95 masks are commonly used for protection against particulate matter such as dust, smoke, and various airborne pollutants. They have become particularly popular during health crises such as the COVID-19 pandemic as a tool for reducing the transmission of respiratory viruses.

name: Whistle
description: A whistle is a small wind instrument that produces sound when air is blown through a narrow opening. It typically consists of a hollow tube with a mouthpiece at one end and a small hole or holes along its length. When air is forced through the mouthpiece and across the hole(s), it creates vibrations that generate a high-pitched sound.

name: Canned Goods
description: Canned goods refer to food items that have been processed, preserved, and sealed in airtight containers, typically made of metal (such as tinplate or aluminum) or glass. The process of canning involves heating the food to a high temperature to kill bacteria, sealing it in the container to prevent contamination, and creating a vacuum to inhibit spoilage.
